summary: This document is an email communication from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, dated December 20, 2009. The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating that the information may be attorney-client privileged and is intended solely for the recipient. The document emphasizes the prohibition of unauthorized use or disclosure of the communication.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein

keyFacts: The communication is marked as confidential and may be attorney-client privileged.
Unauthorized use or disclosure of the email content is strictly prohibited.
